comment.author: 77206800@N04
comment._content: The street looks to wide to be Moore Street it looks more like Camden Street

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77206800@N04] I know. That has always bothered me too, but this is one of a whole series of Elinor Wiltshire photos that we have always been led to believe were taken on Moore Street... We need input from a streetscape expert! Either that, or I'll have to take myself off to Camden Street with this in hand, to compare the skyline...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 56561477@N02
comment._content: Street could be Thomas St.with the Clock Pub behind?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/56561477@N02] Frontage of The Clock Pub is very different, I think. But I'm still wondering about Camden Street, as [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77206800@N04] suggested a week or so back...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 47596822@N02
comment._content: south side ok thes photos was put up on Dublin down memory lane (FACEBOOK) some time ago people commented about this woman and her 2 children her name and where they were from,unfortunately all old photos and comments going back seem to be removed by facebook

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/dublin_down_memory_lane] That's a shame! I see a lot of our photos on Dublin Down Memory Lane on FB, which is lovely. But I wish people would say where they got them from - whether from here or from online images via our catalogue...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
